CloudCannon Suite

An opinionated set of tools used to build and maintain static sites.

Welcome

Welcome to a new life of maintainable static sites using Jekyll and Gulp.

  • New to the suite? Install global requirements
  • Have a new site? Adding a package.json and gulpfile
  • Need more? Choose a package below to add

Packages

Choose a package to install:

  • Dev Develop your Jekyll site
  • Distribute Baseurl configured in one spot not everywhere
  • Docs Document your site using the same tools
  • Help List the available tasks
  • I18n Translate your site using data-i18n tags
  • Screenshots Generate screenshots of your site using phantomJS

Don't see what you need? Contact george@cloudcannon.com.
